idea-plugin.name: flutter_add_image_new
idea-plugin.description:
How to use: right click in the folder --> new -->FlutterAddImage The first run will generate A files (similar to Android's R file) add a new 3x image,auto gen x 2x . Don't forget to add your folder at pubspec.yaml
使用方法:在文件夹右键 --> new -->FlutterAddImage 添加一个3倍的图片,自动生成 1倍 2倍的 第一次运行会生成A文件(类似android的R文件). 别忘了在pubspec.yaml添加你的文件夹
